video.title: Taratabong: The World of the Meloditties
video.synopsis: Communicating through sound and rhythm, the Meloditties create a new melody in every episode, introducing preschoolers to the magical world of music.

episodes.synopsis: We're in Taratabong, where the Meloditties live, getting to know the main characters. / Trumpee and Snaree meet the Xilo brothers for the first time.
episodes.title: The Meloditties / Where's Do? / The Bum Note / The Way to School

episodes.synopsis: Trumpee and Snaree set off to explore the world and come across a long railway track. / It's bath day, but Trumpee and Snaree don't want to get baths.
episodes.title: The Mysterious Track / Splish Splash / Hide and Go Seek... the Echo / Happy Birthday!

episodes.synopsis: Maestro Nomo leads the Meloditties on a walk through Taratabong. / The four Sax brothers arrive in Taratabong, swimming like ducks on the pond.
episodes.title: Here Not There / The Sax Brothers / Shy Fluto / A Quiet Winter

episodes.synopsis: Trumpee and Snaree are taking a big bath in the pond. / The Meloditties are having fun with leaves when a gust of wind blows off Bone's mustache.
episodes.title: Soft and Loud / Wind Song / Carnival Time / Happy and Sad

episodes.synopsis: Trumpee and Snaree make a new friend, Trebass, a double bass who is always tired. / The Meloditties meet Tarrita, a guitar with a broken string.
episodes.title: The Yawning Double Bass / The Off-Key Guitar / Follow the Beat / Musical Theater

episodes.synopsis: Grando the grand piano agrees to play horse while the Meloditties all climb onto his back. / The Meloditties meet Robo, a synthesizer.
episodes.title: Taking Turns / Robo the Synthesizer / The Magic Carousel / Jump Up

episodes.synopsis: Tarrita the guitar is sad, as she is missing her cousins Jo, Electra and Andolino. / The Meloditties family goes on a botanic excursion.
episodes.title: Tarrita and Her Cousins / Ding Dong Bell / Big Voice, Little Voice / The Music of the Stars

episodes.synopsis: Grandpa Tuba awakens from a nap and starts to roar. / The Meloditties are multiplied by their reflections in a mirror and form a big band.
episodes.title: Grandpa Tuba / The Meloditty Big Band / A Strange Lesson / Drumba, We've Got Visitors

episodes.synopsis: At school, Maestro Nomo shows a large cone-shaped object: It is a megaphone. / Trumpee is in a bad mood. He drags his feet and plays reluctantly.
episodes.title: Megaphone and Microphone / A Bad Day in Taratabong / Giant Pipeorg / Party Time in the Forest

episodes.synopsis: At the edge of Taratabong's pond, Snaree is skimming pebbles. / Snaree finds Tymp, a sad kettledrum who is waiting for his twin brother.
episodes.title: Lamellophones / The Tympani Twins / Ghing Gong / What Soon, the Bassoon, Saw

episodes.synopsis: Boe is an elegant oboe that sings for the moon. / Trumpee and Snaree are plowing the ground in order to create a vegetable garden.
episodes.title: Moonlight Sonata / Sound Patterns / Clary, the Chatterbox Clarinet / Professor Harpsy

episodes.synopsis: Maestro Nomo introduces Snaree to Agatha, a harp. / Trumpee and Snaree are playing basketball. The ball gets stuck inside Frenchy, a nice French horn.
episodes.title: The Amazing Harp / The Horn Friends / The Pianola / Penny Among the Pumpkins

episodes.synopsis: Electra goes to the airport to pick up her cousin Paco, the electric bass. / Maestro Nomo and Grando cannot remember a song that they love.
episodes.title: Paco, the Electric Bass / Taperee Remembers / Practice Makes Perfect / The String Family
